row.process:
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR_STRING# = &UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR_STRING#, "/", "\/")
FailIfNotRunning() { :IF &UC4RB_TC_FAIL_IF_NOT_RUNNING# = "YES" exit 1 :ELSE exit 0 :ENDIF }
IsTomcatRunning() {
is_tomcat_running=0
:SET &UNIX#= GET_VAR('UC_HOST_SW', &AGENT#)
:IF &UNIX# = "HP-UX" tomcat_command=`ps -efx | grep "catalina\.home=&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR_STRING#.* org\.apache\.catalina\.startup\.Bootstrap start"` :ENDIF :IF &UNIX# = "SunOS" pid_list=`ps -ef | awk '{print $2}'` tomcat_command=`for i in $pid_list ; do pargs -l $i 2>/dev/null | grep "catalina\.home=&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR_STRING#.* org\.apache\.catalina\.startup\.Bootstrap start" done` :ENDIF :IF &UNIX# = "AIX" OR "Linux" tomcat_command=`ps -ef | grep "catalina\.home=&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR_STRING#.* org\.apache\.catalina\.startup\.Bootstrap start"` :ENDIF
if [ -n "$tomcat_command" ]; then is_tomcat_running=1 fi
echo $is_tomcat_running
}
!------------------------------------------------------- ShutdownTomcat() {
:IF &UC4RB_TC_STOP_MODE# = "SCRIPT"
cd "&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/bin" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX ! chmod +x catalina.sh sh catalina.sh stop :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
:ELSE
if [ -e "&UC4RB_TC_SERVICE_NAME#" ]; then "&UC4RB_TC_SERVICE_NAME#" stop :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX else echo "There is no service &UC4RB_TC_SERVICE_NAME#" exit 2 fi
:ENDIF
}
!-------------------------------------------------------
is_tomcat_running=`IsTomcatRunning`
if [ $is_tomcat_running -gt 0 ]; then echo "Tomcat is running. Stopping ..." ShutdownTomcat else echo "Tomcat is not running. Exiting ..." FailIfNotRunning fi
!Check if Tomcat is stopped sleep 5 echo "Check if Tomcat is stopped..."
is_tomcat_running=`IsTomcatRunning`
if [ $is_tomcat_running -eq 0 ]; then echo "Tomcat has been stopped. " exit 0 else echo "Stop Tomcat failed" exit 2 fi
